about_the_game: Welcome back to the enchanting world of Eastward, accompanied this time, by a fresh soundtrack filled with new themes and melodies, composed exclusively for Eastward: Octopia! With a spring in his step and a tune in his heart, Joel Corelitz has once again lovingly handcrafted a nostalgic palette to compliment Sam and John's new life in the mountains.
detailed_description: Welcome back to the enchanting world of Eastward, accompanied this time, by a fresh soundtrack filled with new themes and melodies, composed exclusively for Eastward: Octopia! With a spring in his step and a tune in his heart, Joel Corelitz has once again lovingly handcrafted a nostalgic palette to compliment Sam and John's new life in the mountains.

name: Eastward Octopia OST
